# Part 1: Segmenting Colleges

```{r}
#| message: false

scale0 = function(x) {
  (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
}

colleges = read_csv("college.csv") %>%
  filter(state == "IN") %>%
  column_to_rownames(var = "name") %>%
  select(faculty_salary_avg, tuition) %>%
  mutate_all(.funs = scale0)
```
